title: #59: Profiling and Talking Murder
description:
The Real Crime Profile Team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) talk about profiling, linkage analysis and answer your questions.

New to Real Crime Profile? Never miss an episode by subscribing today at smarturl.it/realcrime
